segment.source: Car Maintenance
segment.target: Car Maintenance

segment.source: Avoid costly repairs by constantly performing simple maintenance tasks.
segment.target: Avoid costly repairs by constantly performing simple maintenance tasks.

xmrk:task.domains: (topic task) (topic hi-d) (topic ut-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic task strictTaskbody-c)

segment.source: Changing the oil in your car
segment.target: Changing the oil in your car

segment.source: Once every 6000 kilometers or three months, change the oil in your car.
segment.target: Once every 6000 kilometers or three months, change the oil in your car.

segment.source: Changing the oil regularly will help keep the engine in good condition.
segment.target: Changing the oil regularly will help keep the engine in good condition.

segment.source: To change the oil:
segment.target: To change the oil:

segment.source: Remove the old oil filter.
segment.target: Remove the old oil filter.

segment.source: Drain the old oil.
segment.target: Drain the old oil.

segment.source: Recycle the oil and oil filter by taking them to the nearest service station or auto shop.
segment.target: Recycle the oil and oil filter by taking them to the nearest service station or auto shop.

segment.source: Install the drain plug.
segment.target: Install the drain plug.

segment.source: Install a new oil filter and gasket. Most oil filters need to be tightened by hand. Overtightening them might damage the gasket.
segment.target: Install a new oil filter and gasket. Most oil filters need to be tightened by hand. Overtightening them might damage the gasket.

segment.source: Add new oil to the engine.
segment.target: Add new oil to the engine.

segment.source: Check the air filter and replace or clean it.
segment.target: Check the air filter and replace or clean it.

segment.source: Top up the windshield washer fluid.
segment.target: Top up the windshield washer fluid.

xmrk:task.domains: (topic task) (topic hi-d) (topic ut-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic task strictTaskbody-c)

segment.source: Washing the car
segment.target: Washing the car

segment.source: Keep your car looking great by washing it regularly.
segment.target: Keep your car looking great by washing it regularly.

segment.source: Move the car onto the driveway. Avoid washing the car in direct sunlight as this might damage the paint.
segment.target: Move the car onto the driveway. Avoid washing the car in direct sunlight as this might damage the paint.

segment.source: Attach the water hose to a spout and pull the free end over to the car.
segment.target: Attach the water hose to a spout and pull the free end over to the car.

segment.source: Fill a bucket with soapy water.
segment.target: Fill a bucket with soapy water.

segment.source: Use a sponge to apply the soapy water to the car and gently remove the dirt.
segment.target: Use a sponge to apply the soapy water to the car and gently remove the dirt.

segment.source: Rinse the car by spraying clean water from the hose.
segment.target: Rinse the car by spraying clean water from the hose.

segment.source: Dry the car using a dampened chamois.
segment.target: Dry the car using a dampened chamois.

xmrk:concept.domains: (topic concept) (topic hi-d) (topic ut-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d)

segment.source: Garage Tasks
segment.target: Garage Tasks

segment.source: When you go into the garage, be prepared to get your hands dirty!
segment.target: When you go into the garage, be prepared to get your hands dirty!

xmrk:task.domains: (topic task) (topic hi-d) (topic ut-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic task strictTaskbody-c)

segment.source: Organizing the workbench and tools
segment.target: Organizing the workbench and tools

segment.source: Keep your garage neat by organizing the things you keep in the garage.
segment.target: Keep your garage neat by organizing the things you keep in the garage.

xmrk:task.domains: (topic task) (topic hi-d) (topic ut-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic task strictTaskbody-c)

segment.source: Shovelling snow
segment.target: Shovelling snow

segment.source: Keep your driveway and sidewalks clear of snow and ice by shovelling after any snowfall.
segment.target: Keep your driveway and sidewalks clear of snow and ice by shovelling after any snowfall.

segment.source: Get the shovel out of the garage
segment.target: Get the shovel out of the garage

segment.source: Shovel the driveway, starting at the garage door and working out to the street.
segment.target: Shovel the driveway, starting at the garage door and working out to the street.

segment.source: Shovel the sidewalk in front of your house.
segment.target: Shovel the sidewalk in front of your house.

segment.source: Shovel the walk to your front door.
segment.target: Shovel the walk to your front door.

xmrk:task.domains: (topic task) (topic hi-d) (topic ut-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic task strictTaskbody-c)

segment.source: Spray painting
segment.target: Spray painting

segment.source: When paint is applied using a spray nozzle, it is referred to as spray painting.
segment.target: When paint is applied using a spray nozzle, it is referred to as spray painting.

segment.source: The garage is a good place to spray paint.
segment.target: The garage is a good place to spray paint.

segment.source: Move the car out of the garage to avoid getting paint on it.
segment.target: Move the car out of the garage to avoid getting paint on it.

segment.source: Place newspaper, cardboard, or a drop-cloth on the garage floor.
segment.target: Place newspaper, cardboard, or a drop-cloth on the garage floor.

segment.source: Place the object to be painted on the covered area.
segment.target: Place the object to be painted on the covered area.

segment.source: Follow the directions on the paint can to paint the object.
segment.target: Follow the directions on the paint can to paint the object.

segment.source: Let the paint dry thoroughly before you move the object.
segment.target: Let the paint dry thoroughly before you move the object.

xmrk:task.domains: (topic task) (topic hi-d) (topic ut-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic abbrev-d) (topic pr-d) (topic sw-d) (topic ui-d) (topic task strictTaskbody-c)

segment.source: Taking out the garbage
segment.target: Taking out the garbage

segment.source: Regular garbage removal is necessary for the proper functioning of a home.
segment.target: Regular garbage removal is necessary for the proper functioning of a home.

segment.source: Your municipality collects garbage from homes once a week, usually early in the morning.
segment.target: Your municipality collects garbage from homes once a week, usually early in the morning.

segment.source: Find out from the town what day of the week garbage is collected in your neighborhood.
segment.target: Find out from the town what day of the week garbage is collected in your neighborhood.

segment.source: The night before collection, place the garbage cans on the curb.
segment.target: The night before collection, place the garbage cans on the curb.

segment.source: After the garbage has been collected, move the cans back into your garage.
segment.target: After the garbage has been collected, move the cans back into your garage.

segment.source: Garage Concepts
segment.target: Garage Concepts

segment.source: A well-stocked garage can be the envy of the neighborhood.
segment.target: A well-stocked garage can be the envy of the neighborhood.

segment.source: Lawnmower
segment.target: Lawnmower

segment.source: The lawnmower is a machine used to cut grass in the yard.
segment.target: The lawnmower is a machine used to cut grass in the yard.

segment.source: Lawnmowers can be electric, gas-powered, or manual.
segment.target: Lawnmowers can be electric, gas-powered, or manual.

segment.source: Oil
segment.target: Oil

segment.source: Motor oil keeps your car's engine running smoothly.
segment.target: Motor oil keeps your car's engine running smoothly.

segment.source: Oil should be changed every 6000 kilometers.
segment.target: Oil should be changed every 6000 kilometers.

segment.source: Paint
segment.target: Paint

segment.source: Paint is useful for refreshing the look of rooms and furniture.
segment.target: Paint is useful for refreshing the look of rooms and furniture.

segment.source: Store unused paint in the garage.
segment.target: Store unused paint in the garage.

segment.source: Shelving
segment.target: Shelving

segment.source: Wooden or metal shelving is useful for storing things in the garage.
segment.target: Wooden or metal shelving is useful for storing things in the garage.

segment.source: Shelving also keeps things neat and organized.
segment.target: Shelving also keeps things neat and organized.

segment.source: Snow shovel
segment.target: Snow shovel

segment.source: Use the snow shovel to clear the drive way and side walk of snow in the winter.
segment.target: Use the snow shovel to clear the drive way and side walk of snow in the winter.

segment.source: A good snow shovel has a straight, wide scoop and a strong handle. To help snow come off the scoop, spray the scoop with cooking spray.
segment.target: A good snow shovel has a straight, wide scoop and a strong handle. To help snow come off the scoop, spray the scoop with cooking spray.

segment.source: Tool box
segment.target: Tool box

segment.source: A tool box contains many compartments for organizing tools and hardware.
segment.target: A tool box contains many compartments for organizing tools and hardware.

segment.source: Keep the tool box handy for all sorts of jobs around the house.
segment.target: Keep the tool box handy for all sorts of jobs around the house.

segment.source: Tools
segment.target: Tools

segment.source: Invest in a good set of tools for doing all kinds of tasks around the house.
segment.target: Invest in a good set of tools for doing all kinds of tasks around the house.

segment.source: Useful tools include the following items:
segment.target: Useful tools include the following items:

segment.source: Hammer
segment.target: Hammer

segment.source: Screw driver set
segment.target: Screw driver set

segment.source: Wrench set
segment.target: Wrench set

segment.source: Nails and screws
segment.target: Nails and screws

segment.source: Level
segment.target: Level

segment.source: Saws
segment.target: Saws

segment.source: Drill
segment.target: Drill

segment.source: Air pressure gauge
segment.target: Air pressure gauge

segment.source: Spade
segment.target: Spade

segment.source: Rake
segment.target: Rake

segment.source: Keep your tools organized in a tool box which you can store in the garage.
segment.target: Keep your tools organized in a tool box which you can store in the garage.

segment.source: Water hose
segment.target: Water hose

segment.source: A water hose is useful for cleaning and gardening projects around the yard.
segment.target: A water hose is useful for cleaning and gardening projects around the yard.

segment.source: Keep the hose coiled on a large hook near a water spout.
segment.target: Keep the hose coiled on a large hook near a water spout.

segment.target: Wheel barrow

segment.source: A good wheel barrow will save your back from extensive trauma when you garden.
segment.target: A good wheel barrow will save your back from extensive trauma when you garden.

segment.source: Workbench
segment.target: Workbench

segment.source: Use the workbench for storing tools and hardware, and for doing small projects.
segment.target: Use the workbench for storing tools and hardware, and for doing small projects.

segment.source: Windshield washer fluid
segment.target: Windshield washer fluid

segment.source: Windshield washer fluid is required to keep your windshield wipers functioning properly.
segment.target: Windshield washer fluid is required to keep your windshield wipers functioning properly.

segment.source: Keep your car's windshield washer fluid topped up so you will have a clean windshield whatever the weather or insect population.
segment.target: Keep your car's windshield washer fluid topped up so you will have a clean windshield whatever the weather or insect population.
